channel.title: Comments on: Bill asks, “Is there any way I can completely block pop-up ads?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: jack hell
item.dc:creator: jack hell
item.description: Really lovin how I got to close a popup before reading this article...
item.content:encoded: Really lovin how I got to close a popup before reading this article…

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: Sorry you're having trouble with the instructions, B%!!$#!^. I just checked them to make sure they were still valid as Chrome does get frequent updates. The instructions still work. You might want to watch the video that MultiTechs posted in the comments above. It shows more visually how to fix it.
item.content:encoded: Sorry you’re having trouble with the instructions, B%!!$#!^. I just checked them to make sure they were still valid as Chrome does get frequent updates. The instructions still work. You might want to watch the video that MultiTechs posted in the comments above. It shows more visually how to fix it.

item.title: By: B%!!$#!^
item.dc:creator: B%!!$#!^
item.description: its too bad $#!^ like this is never actually helpful. followed the google chrome directions to a tee. no pop up blocker. Not even a search result for pop up or any variation. I must have the communist version of chrome then right?
item.content:encoded: its too bad $#!^ like this is never actually helpful. followed the google chrome directions to a tee. no pop up blocker. Not even a search result for pop up or any variation. I must have the communist version of chrome then right?

item.title: By: Multi Techs
item.dc:creator: Multi Techs
item.description: This video shows how to block them. <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/WBiOlO1jwX4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
item.content:encoded: This video shows how to block them.

item.title: By: Free User
item.dc:creator: Free User
item.description:
"Please pop-up block responsibly!"
I will kill all ads I can.
item.content:encoded:
“Please pop-up block responsibly!”
